sen.j: 飛鳥に残っていた有間皇子に、中大兄皇子の意を受けたと思われる蘇我赤兄が近づき、斉明天皇や中大兄皇子の失政を指摘し、自分は皇子の味方である事を伝え、斉明天皇と中大兄皇子打倒の計画を練った。
sen.e: Soga no Akae, supposedly in conformity to Naka no Oe no Oji's wishes, approached Arima no miko staying behind in Asuka and, together with Arima no miko, plotted to overthrow Empress Saimei and Naka no Oe no Oji by disapproving of misgovernment under these two and convincing Arima no miko of his support to miko.
